p: After isolation, the cells suspension in RPMI 1640 (with stable glutamine, 25 mM HEPES and with the addition of 10% FBS and 1% penicillin–streptomycin solution) was seeded on a 96-wells plate at the concentration 2 × 10 6 cells/mL. To appropriate wells were added tested extracts at final concentrations in well 6.25, 12.5, 25 or 50 µM. Cells with extracts were incubated in 24 h at 37 °C with 5% CO 2.
